vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.19;
son of: Merari (H4847);
brother of: Mahli (H4249) and Jaaziah (H3269);
father of: Mahli (H4249H), Eder (H5740A) and Jerimoth (H3406K)
Also named: mu.shi (מוּשִׁי "Mushite" H4188)
§ Mushi = "yielding"
son of Merari, grandson of Kohath, and great grandson of Levi
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Merarí; tribu de Leví; (b)   descendiente de Musí; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
母示 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "柔順的"
米拉利的兒子, 哥轄的孫子, 利未的曾孫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
母示 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "柔顺的"
米拉利的儿子, 哥辖的孙子, 利未的曾孙
